title: Junior Platform-utvecklare
description:
**Junior Power Platform-utvecklare – digitalisering av verksamhetsprocesser**

**Rollbeskrivning**  

Vi söker en junior Power Platform-utvecklare till ett uppdrag med fokus på att digitalisera interna verksamhetsprocesser i en större offentlig organisation. Uppdraget omfattar bland annat stöd för godkännande av kameraövervakning samt förenklad risk- och konsekvensanalys vid energioptimeringsprojekt. Du arbetar nära verksamheten för att omsätta behov till smarta, hållbara lösningar baserade på Microsoft 365 och Power Platform.

**Arbetsuppgifter**

* Delta i kravprocessen, inklusive visualisering och estimering av lösningar
* Ta fram lösningar baserade på M365 och Power Platform (framför allt Power Apps)
* Utveckla dashboards och vyer för uppföljning av processer och ärenden
* Genomföra möten och workshops för kravbearbetning och dialog med verksamheten
* Samarbeta med IT-organisationen kring arkitektur, säkerhet och governance för plattformen
* Säkerställa korrekt behörighetshantering för framtagna lösningar
* Arbeta med livscykelhantering av Power Apps, från utveckling till förvaltning
* Dokumentera lösningen inför överlämning till förvaltningsorganisation

**Krav**

* Erfarenhet av governance inom Microsoft-plattformen (M365/Power Platform)
* Kunskap och praktisk erfarenhet inom low-code-utveckling i Power Apps
* Kunskap om behörighetshantering och åtkomststyrning i framtagna lösningar
* Kunskap om livscykelhantering av Power Apps, inklusive förvaltning och vidareutveckling
* Erfarenhet av Azure DevOps och etablerad metodik för utveckling i verktyget
* Förmåga att arbeta strukturerat, självständigt och i nära samverkan med verksamheten
* God kommunikativ förmåga på svenska, både i tal och skrift

**Meriterande**

* Erfarenhet av leveranser till större offentliga organisationer
* Erfarenhet av lösningar byggda på Power Platform för verksamhetsprocesser
* Erfarenhet av att visualisera lösningsförslag i kravprocessen (t.ex. prototyper, mockups, flöden)

title: Digital kanal- och ux-utvecklare
description:
**Din roll**
------------


I din roll kommer du att ansvara för att utveckla, strukturera och förvalta organisationens digitala kanaler. Rollen kombinerar strategisk kommunikation, kreativ idéutveckling och teknisk kompetens för att skapa användarvänliga, tillgängliga och målgruppsanpassade lösningar.  

  

Du ansvarar även för utveckling och integrering av webblösningar i våra digitala kanaler såsom webbplats, digitala skärmar och andra relevanta digitala kanaler och lösningar så att staden kan arbeta agilt med ett utvecklingsfokus utifrån ett användarperspektiv.**Din profil**
--------------


Vi söker dig som har en utbildning inom webbdesign, webbutveckling, programmering, systemarkitektur, kommunikation eller motsvarande som arbetsgivaren bedömer som likvärdig.  

  

Vi tror att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med CMS (t. ex. Sitevision, WordPress eller liknande) samt erfarenhet av att bygga och strukturera webbplatser från grunden eller genom vidareutveckling. Du är van att arbeta datadrivet och att omvandla insikter och trender till strategier för utveckling av kanaler, sök, webbplatser och innehåll. Vi tänker även att du har god erfarenhet av UX-design och att driva utveckling av digitala kanaler.  

  

För tjänsten är det viktigt med goda kunskaper i:  

  

* HTML, CSS och grundläggande JavaScript
* Api:er och hur dataintegrationer fungerar
* Figma eller Adobe XD
* Tillgänglighet, WCAG och DOS-lagen

  

Du har en förståelse för informationsarkitektur och användarcentrerad design samt en förmåga att analysera och omsätta kommunikativa, tekniska och strukturella behov i praktiska lösningar. Du har även vana av att arbeta med SEO-optimering, metadata, intern sökmotorlogik, UX-writing och klarspråk samt att använda och tolka data från verktyg som Siteimprove, Matomo, Google Analytics eller motsvarande.  

  

Vi ser det som meriterande om du har tidigare erfarenhet av webbdesign och agila arbetssätt och/eller projektledning. Det är även meriterande om du har erfarenhet av ett arbete inom offentlig sektor.  

  

Som person tror vi att du är serviceinriktad, självgående och har en väl utvecklad samarbetsförmåga. Du är även kreativ med god känsla för struktur och detaljer.  

  

I Lidingö stad arbetar vi utifrån värdeorden engagerad, professionell och initiativrik. Vi förväntar oss att du bidrar med en stor skopa engagemang, ett professionellt förhållningssätt och att du tar initiativ för att ständigt utveckla dig och verksamheten.**Om Lidingö stad**
-------------------


Vi tillhör stadsledningskontoret som är en av våra sex förvaltningar i Lidingö stad. Hos oss arbetar cirka 120 medarbetare. Vi fungerar som bron mellan politik, förvaltning och stadens olika verksamheter. Dagligen hjälper vi våra kollegor med råd, stöd och service inom hr, ekonomi, upphandling, kommunikation, registratur, juridik och it. Här samlas stor kompetens och många yrkeskategorier vilket ger en dynamisk arbetsmiljö med mycket utbyte och lärande.
  

  

Nu söker vi dig som vill arbeta som digital kanal- och ux-utvecklare hos oss. Det är en nyinrättat tjänst som skall driva utvecklingen av både befintliga och nya kanaler för att säkerställa att staden har användarvänliga och relevanta kanaler, tjänster och funktioner som ger en god användarupplevelse.  

  

Tjänsten är, tillsammans med till exempel systemförvaltare för webben och lösningsarkitekt, organisatoriskt placerad på it- och digitaliseringsenheten, men arbetet sker i nära samarbete med kommunikationsenheten och andra verksamheter inom staden.**Övrig information**
---------------------


Staden tillämpar individuell lönesättning. Tillträde enligt överenskommelse.  

  

Välkommen till Lidingö stad! Här kan du njuta av närheten till natur & skärgård med endast 15 minuters avstånd till T-centralen. Vi vill vara en attraktiv arbetsgivare som erbjuder utvecklingsmöjligheter. Vi vill ständigt förbättras och strävar efter att vara en lärande organisation i framkant. Om du delar vår passion för utvecklande ledarskap, ett aktivt medarbetarskap och en inkluderande arbetsplats är det till oss du ska söka för att bli en del av oss i Lidingö stad! Tillsammans kan vi skapa en meningsfull och berikande arbetsmiljö där vi kan växa och göra skillnad tillsammans.  

  

Lidingö stad arbetar med kompetensbaserad rekrytering så att varje person bedöms utifrån sin kompetens och att vi motverkar diskriminering.  

  

Inför rekryteringsarbetet har Lidingö stad tagit ställning till rekryteringskanaler och marknadsföring. Vi undanber oss därför kontakt med mediesäljare, rekryteringssajter och liknande.### **Ansökningsinformation**

title: Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi söker en Systemutvecklare BESAM Maximo Mobile till en myndighet inom Trafik.


Detta är ett konsultuppdrag. Stationeringsort är Stockholm.


Tjänsten är på heltid.


Uppdraget innebär ett nära samarbete med kunden vilket ställer stora krav på flexibilitet och samarbetsförmåga.

**Uppdraget**


Rollen innebär att leda och utföra arbete inom implementation och konfigurering av Maximo Mobile för MAS 9.x inom förvaltning och utveckling av tillgångshanteringssystem. Uppdraget omfattar kartläggning av befintlig mobilapplikation, konfigurering, tester, dokumentation samt framtagande av förvaltningsplan och process för release och utveckling. Rollen kräver förmåga att prioritera förvaltningsrelaterade aktiviteter och samordna med övriga produktområden.

 **Arbetsuppgifter**


Leda och utföra implementation och konfigurering av Maximo Mobile för MAS 9.x.


Kartlägga befintlig mobilapplikation som underlag inför implementation.


Genomföra tester och dokumentation kopplat till Maximo Mobile.


Bidra till framtagande av förvaltningsplan för vidmakthållande av Maximo Mobile.


Utveckla process för release och vidareutveckling av implementeringen.


Prioritera förvaltningsrelaterade aktiviteter samt koordinera med övriga produktområden.

 **Krav (OBS, obligatoriska)**


Flytande svenska i tal och skrift.


Minst 5 (fem) års arbetslivserfarenhet av utveckling och konfigurering i Maximo.  

  

Minst 5 (fem) års erfarenhet av utveckling mot SQL och Oracle -databaser.  

  

Minst 2 (två) års erfarenhet av att konfigurera och sätta upp Maximo Mobile.  

  

Minst 2 (två) års erfarenhet av arbete med Maximo Mobile i Maximo MAS.

**Meriterande**

Minst 5 års erfarenhet av tillgångsförvaltning av infrastruktur eller tekniska anläggningar, såsom spårbunden infrastruktur, energi- och elinfrastruktur, VA-anläggningar, industriella anläggningar eller motsvarande.  

  

Erfarenhet av att utveckla och jobba med automattestning från minst ett projekt/uppdrag.  

  

Erfarenhet av att utveckla och arbeta med tekniska system inom infrastruktur, inklusive signalreläer eller andra roterande och mekaniska system, från minst ett uppdrag.

  

Erfarenhet av att jobba i offentlig sektor från minst 1 uppdrag.

**Personliga egenskaper**


God samarbetsförmåga och teamorienterad


God kommunikationsförmåga på svenska i både tal och skrift


Kundorienterad och lösningsfokuserad


Självgående och ansvarstagande


Lyhörd och anpassningsbar i samarbete med teamet





**Om oss**


Centios övergripande mål är att vara ett konsultbolag som erbjuder smarta och hållbara lösningar som utvecklar samhället på ett positivt sätt.


Våra medarbetare erbjuds villkor som är anpassade för individen. Det innebär att arbetstider, arbetsomfattning, arbetsplats och kompetensutveckling så långt som möjligt anpassas utifrån medarbetarens behov.


Bland våra medarbetare hittar du engagerad personer som brinner för samhällsutveckling. Vi jobbar i små grupper där du kan bidra med dina erfarenheter samtidigt som du får ta del av andras kunskap och erfarenhet.


För oss är det viktigt med välmående och att hitta en sund balans mellan arbete och fritid. Därför har vi en nollvision mot stress och sätter trivsel och hälsa främst.


Läs gärna mer om oss på centio.se.

**Vänligen skicka ditt CV på svenska.**

Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Backendutvecklare
description:
Vi söker en senior Backendutvecklare Färdtjänsten till en myndighet inom trafik.


Detta är ett konsultuppdrag.


Tjänsten är på heltid. Stationeringsort är Stockholm.


Uppdraget innebär ett nära samarbete med kunden vilket ställer stora krav på flexibilitet och samarbetsförmåga.

**Uppdraget**


Rollen innebär backend-utveckling i C# /.NET inom digitala kanaler för särskilda persontransporter, med fokus på att utveckla och anpassa API-lager som kommunicerar med backend-system. Uppdraget omfattar både självständigt arbete och samarbete i ett agilt team, inklusive DevOps i Windows, Linux och Kubernetes. Konsulten bidrar till lösningsarkitektur, kunskapsöverföring till övriga utvecklare samt säkerställer åtgärder som ökar trygghet för resenärer. Erfarenhet av integrationer och hög kommunikativ förmåga är viktig.

 **Arbetsuppgifter**


Utveckla och anpassa API-lager som kommunicerar med backend-system i digitala kanaler för särskilda persontransporter.


Arbeta med backend-utveckling i C# /.NET.


Hantera DevOps i Windows, Linux och Kubernetes-miljöer.


Arbeta självständigt och som del av ett agilt team.


Bidra till design av lösningsarkitektur och förmedla kunskaper till övriga utvecklare.


Arbeta med många integrationer mellan system.


Säkerställa åtgärder som ökar trygghet för resenärer.


Kommunicera effektivt och samarbeta med team och övriga intressenter.

 **Krav (OBS, obligatoriska)**


Flytande svenska i tal och skrift.


Minst sju (7) års dokumenterad yrkeserfarenhet av utveckling med C#, .NET, Entity Framework samt ASP.NET Core.  

  

Minst fem (5) års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av relevant databasimplementering, exempelvis T-SQL.  

  

Minst tre (3) års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av arbete med testdriven utveckling, genom exempelvis testramverk och testautomatisering (exempelvis enligt BDD-metodik och med verktyg som Gherkin eller Cucumber).  

  

Minst tre (3) års arbetslivserfarenhet av att konfigurera och administrera Microsoft SQL Server (MSSQL), inklusive arbete med klustring, databassystemarkitektur samt optimering av frågor (query tuning).  

  

Minst fem (5) års arbetslivserfarenhet av arbete med containerisering och orkestrering i Kubernetes och Docker.  

  

Minst fem (5) års av arbete i Windowsmiljöer med fokus på drift och övervakning i produktionsmiljöer (ex, IIS och Windows Services).  

  

Minst tre (3) års arbetslivserfarenhet av att konfigurering och administration av nätverk och applikationer i windowsmiljö.  

  

Minst fem (5) års dokumenterad erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling i agila team med versionshantering i Git, inklusive etablerande av arbetsflöden såsom Gitflow och/eller GitHub Flow  

  

Minst fem (5) års arbetslivserfarenhet av att jobba inom DevOps projekt med infrastruktur som kod, med exempelvis Helm charts eller Terraform.  

  

Minst fem (5) års arbetslivserfarenhet i uppdrag med komplexa IT-miljöer, innefattande arbete med distribuerade och integrerade system, tredjepartssystem samt driftleverantörers system.
  

  

Minst tre (3) års arbetslivserfarenhet av utveckling av applikationer med kö- och eventhanteringssystem, exempelvis Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ eller annan jämförbar plattform.

**Meriterande**

Minst fem (5) års arbetslivserfarenhet av NoSQL programmering.  

  

"Minst ett (1) års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av Frontendutveckling React, CSS, html programmering , Java script.  

  

"Minst ett (1) års arbetslivserfarenhet av att bygga integrationer mot BankIDs APIer.  

  

"Minst tre (3) års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av applikationsövervakning med ELK, Kibana, Opentelemetry, eller motsvarande.  

  

"Minst tre (3) års arbetslivserfarenhet av att automatisera, konfigurera och administrera windowsmiljöer med PowerShell.  

  

"Minst fem (5) års arbetslivserfarenhet med lösningsarkitektur inom Eventdrivenarkitektur och/eller Microservicearkitektur.

**Personliga egenskaper**


Samarbetsvillig och teamorienterad


Självgående och ansvarstagande


Tydlig och transparent i kommunikation


God ton och respektfull i möten med kollegor och externa parter


Förmåga att samarbeta med olika agila team och externa leverantörer





**Om oss**


Centios övergripande mål är att vara ett konsultbolag som erbjuder smarta och hållbara lösningar som utvecklar samhället på ett positivt sätt.


Våra medarbetare erbjuds villkor som är anpassade för individen. Det innebär att arbetstider, arbetsomfattning, arbetsplats och kompetensutveckling så långt som möjligt anpassas utifrån medarbetarens behov.


Bland våra medarbetare hittar du engagerad personer som brinner för samhällsutveckling. Vi jobbar i små grupper där du kan bidra med dina erfarenheter samtidigt som du får ta del av andras kunskap och erfarenhet.


För oss är det viktigt med välmående och att hitta en sund balans mellan arbete och fritid. Därför har vi en nollvision mot stress och sätter trivsel och hälsa främst.


Läs gärna mer om oss på centio.se.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Join ANIMARUM – Senior Fullstack Developer** 




*Where Technology Meets Humanity* 




 At ANIMARUM, we believe technology should empower people. We are looking for a
 *Senior Fullstack Developer* 
 to help grow our internal team and deliver high-quality, impactful solutions for our clients.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 As a Senior Fullstack Developer, you will:
 



 · Design and build robust, scalable software solutions with a focus on performance, security, and quality.
 



 · Collaborate with clients and cross-functional teams to understand their goals and deliver solutions that make a real impact.
 



 · Be involved in the full delivery lifecycle – from initial strategy and design to implementation, deployment, and testing.
 



 · Take ownership of technical quality, system architecture, and solution reliability.
 



 · Mentor and share knowledge with colleagues, helping elevate the team’s development practices.
 



**What We’re Looking For** 




 · 8+ years of professional experience in Java development (Spring, Spring Boot).
 



 · Hands-on experience with modern frontend technologies, preferably ReactJS and NodeJS.
 



 · Interest in working with a modern React tech stack.
 



 · Strong understanding of cloud platforms (GCP and AWS ), as well as Infrastructure-as-Code and DevOps practices.
 



 · Knowledge in Kubernetes
 



 · Expertise in performance, security, and reliability of software systems.
 



 · A proactive mindset and desire to contribute to a creative, supportive, and inclusive work environment.
 



 · Excellent communication skills in Swedish and English, both written and spoken
 



**Why ANIMARUM** 




 At ANIMARUM, it’s not just about the job – it’s about being part of a team where people truly matter. We offer:
 



 · A human-centered culture with a focus on work-life balance.
 



 · Flexibility to combine your career with your personal life.
 



 · Meaningful benefits: wellness allowance (5,000 SEK), company car/bike options, and an SL travel card.
 



 · The opportunity to give back – donate to a charity of your choice each year.
 



 · Competitive compensation and stock options – because our people are our greatest asset.
 



*Join us and help shape the future of technology with a human touch.*

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Front End Developer med känsla för UX/UI & motion design till Graftus** 




**Plats:** 
 Stockholm / Hybrid
 



**Omfattning:** 
 Heltid
 



**Start:** 
 Så snart som möjligt
 



  





  





**💡 Om rollen** 




 Graftus är Sveriges största plattform för AI-driven säljrekrytering och leadsgenerering — en kombination av tech, data och mänsklig intuition. Vi växer snabbt och söker nu en
 **Front End Developer** 
 som inte bara kodar – utan
 **skapar upplevelser** 
 .
 



 Det här är en roll för dig som vill vara med och
 **forma framtidens gränssnitt mellan människa och AI** 
 . Du kommer att jobba tätt med vårt produktteam för att skapa en
 **intuitiv, snabb och visuellt fängslande användarupplevelse** 
 i både webbplattform och app.
 



  





  





**🎨 Dina uppgifter** 



* Utveckla och förbättra front end-upplevelsen för Graftus plattformar (Typefront, React, React Native, Next.js )
* Designa och implementera eleganta UI-komponenter med pixelperfektion och modern känsla.
* Ta fram
 **animations- och övergångseffekter i After Effects** 
 som förstärker storytelling och interaktion.
* Arbeta nära produktägare och grundare för att förvandla visioner till kod – snabbt.
* Delta i prototyparbete, användartester och löpande optimering av UX-flöden.



  





**🧠 Vi tror att du** 



* Har 3+ års erfarenhet av front end-utveckling (React/Next.js).
* Har en
 **stark känsla för visuell design, typografi och interaktion** 
 .
* Meriterande att du kan
 **After Effects**
* Förstår hur man bygger
 **snabba, responsiva och eleganta** 
 användargränssnitt.
* Trivs i en miljö där
 **estetik, prestanda och upplevelse väger lika tungt som kodkvalitet** 
 .
* Är självgående, nyfiken och älskar att jobba i ett snabbt växande bolag.



  





**⚡ Hos oss får du** 



* Vara en
 **nyckelperson** 
 i ett av Sveriges mest lovande AI-bolag.
* Skapa produkter som används av
 **över 17 000 säljare** 
 och hundratals företag.
* Frihet att
 **experimentera, testa, skapa och påverka direkt** 
 .
* En kultur där idéer får vingar – och där
 **tempo, kvalitet och kreativitet** 
 premieras.
* Möjlighet att bygga upp ett
 **designsystem från grunden** 
 och sätta visuell standard för framtiden.



  





**🦾 Om Graftus** 




 Graftus kombinerar AI och mänsklig potential för att förändra hur företag hittar och utvecklar säljare. Med vår plattform kan företag matcha, rekrytera och generera leads snabbare än någonsin – med hjälp av våra AI-agenter
 **Julia** 
 (rekrytering) och
 **Julius** 
 (lead generation).
 



 Vi befinner oss i en stark expansionsfas och söker nu kreativa och hungriga människor som vill vara med och
 **bygga något som faktiskt gör skillnad** 
 .

title: .NET Developer
description:
**About the role** 




 We are looking for .NET to join our team in Stockholm. You will be working directly with our customers in dynamic and engaging projects. It is a great opportunity for a long term cooperation.
 



  





**About Provide IT** 




 Provide IT is an IT company with a long history. Our team works in a hybrid model from offices in Gothenburg and Stockholm. We focus on two business areas, consulting and digital agency. In consulting, our employees have a great opportunity to work with exciting clients. During these projects they learn a lot by working in diverse teams and on various projects. At the agency, we primarily develop customised websites, systems and applications for our customers. We offer attractive salary and benefits.
 



  





 Provide IT has a great company culture that is key for our employees. We also do a lot of team building activities.
 



  






 Join us and see for yourself!
 




  





**Who You Are** 



* Communicative and a strong team player
* Self-driven and comfortable taking ownership of work
* Someone who enjoys discussing new ideas and contributing to the team’s progress
* Experienced in backend development and confident working with .NET and Web Services



  





**Required Skills** 



* C#
* Web Services (absolutely essential)
* Understanding of large-scale systems & system architecture
* API development
* Event Sourcing & CQRS



  





**Meritorious / Nice-to-have** 



* AWS (especially Docker & Kubernetes)
* Message systems – e.g. RabbitMQ
* Experience setting up larger systems and handling complex solutions
* Dependency Injection frameworks



  





 Hope to hear from you!

title: Fullstack Java-developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Extensive experience building Spring boot microservices and REST based API services
* Proficient in Java 17 and above
* Proficient working with Typescript and React component architecture
* Experience working with Azure Cloud Technologies and Environment
* Experience in unit/integration testing
* Experience working with Cursor, Copilot or other AI-tools
* Experience working with Docker containerization and Kubernetes
* Experience working with external integrations
* Experience working with code optimization and performance improvements
* Experience of agile way of working and Jira
* English skills are mandatory, Swedish is a merit


**Meritorious**
* Experience of retail and working with article data in larger organizations
* Experience setting up Design system - building or maintaining UI component libraries
* Experience working with Next.js framework
* Understanding of Databases (SQL/MongoDB)
* Experience working with Jira
* Kafka and event-based integrations


**Application deadline:** 
 28-11-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
**Senior Frontend Developer role - VC backed startup!** 




  





 Working in collaboration with a fast-paced and high momentum startup in Stockholm, who are now looking for a talented frontend developer to join them on a permanent basis as they scale due to strong investment, an already-validated product and increasing demand from current and new customers!
 



  





 Their product is a unique, white-label B2B platform which enables operators to build, launch, scale and monetise their own iGaming or casino platform - WITHOUT HAVING TO CODE!
 



  





 Think Shopify for the casino sector, they enables the likes of influencers, streamers and other operators to launch their own games, with a highly customizable pre-built platform and infrastructure, handling all bureaucracy and licensing involved with the industry.
 



  





 The company are approx 10-12 people, with a super talented 7 person engineering team, building a high availability, high traffic & data intensive product, where the frontend is pivotal to their user-focused platform!
 



  





 This is a permanent role (hybrid) based out of their brand new Stockholm HQ - full right to work in Sweden & fluent English language skills are required.
 



  





**What you’ll do:** 




  




* Develop highly interactive, performant frontend interfaces using
 **React** 
 ,
 **Next.js** 
 , and
 **TypeScript**
* Define and implement frontend architecture
* Architect reusable component libraries and UI systems using
 **Tailwind CSS**
* Integrate with backend microservices, APIs, and real-time systems (
 **WebSockets** 
 ,
 **GraphQL** 
 ,
 **REST** 
 )
* Build responsive experiences optimized for casino players in what is a high-availability and high traffic platform
* Implement best-in-class UX for lobbies, player wallets, promotions, live-data components, and casino flows
* Work as part of a talented fullstack engineering team within a fast-paced environment, where you can take significant ownership over the frontend, working in close collaboration with a UX/UI designer.



  





  





**Skills we’re looking for:** 




  




* Strong proficiency in
 **TypeScript** 
 ,
 **JavaScript (ES6+)** 
 ,
 **React** 
 ,
 **Next.js** 
 , and
 **Tailwind CSS**
* Experience building consumer-grade, high-engagement interfaces
* Solid understanding of API integration, real-time data handling, and state management
* Excellent understanding of component architecture, modern React patterns, and frontend performance optimisation
* Some experience across the full-stack & backend (Node.JS/AWS) would be great, but not a dealbreaker
* Passion for Web3 / blockchain (bonus, but not strictly required)



  





 This is an opportunity to join a company who has already established and validated their product, but still at an early stage where scope for growth is immense. You'd work on a technically complex product with real-time impact, and be able to take ownership and leadership over the frontend!
 



  





 Please reach out or apply ASAP!

title: BI Developer
description:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
* Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
* Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
* Be a productive member of the team.


 Requirements
   

  

* Design, develop, and implement business applications using Power Apps (Canvas and Model-Driven).
* Automate business processes through Power Automate and enhance SharePoint solutions (lists, forms, workflows).
* Build insightful data visualizations and analytical reports using Power BI.
* Create scalable data models, calculations, and DAX measures to support advanced reporting.
* Develop online analytical processing (OLAP) solutions using relational and multidimensional databases.
* Maintain and optimize existing Power Platform and BI solutions, ensuring high performance and data accuracy.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to data visualization, integrations, and application functionality.
* Gather business requirements and translate them into clear technical solutions.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, stakeholders, and end-users to ensure successful delivery and adoption.
* Provide technical leadership, knowledge sharing, and mentorship to junior team members.
* Stay current with Power Platform advancements and BI best practices.
* Administer Power Platform environments, managing permissions, connectors, and security.
* Perform ongoing maintenance, enhancements, and support for existing applications and legacy solutions.
* Ensure security, data integrity, and governance compliance across all delivered solutions.
* Integrate Power Platform solutions with Microsoft services (Dataverse, SharePoint, Microsoft Teams) and external applications via APIs.
* Utilize JavaScript, CSOM, OData, and related technologies to enable custom extensions and integrations.
* Establish and advocate best practices for scalable, maintainable, and secure development.
* Create and maintain technical documentation (architecture, ALM processes, deployment guides, user documentation).
* Implement DevOps and Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) practices using Azure DevOps or Git-based tooling.
* Strong expertise in Microsoft Power Platform: Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI.
* Proficiency in SharePoint Online configuration and customization.
* Hands-on experience with Dataverse for data modeling and application development.
* Knowledge of software engineering principles, coding standards, and version control (Azure DevOps / Git).
* Experience with C#, .NET, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS is highly desirable.
* Understanding of data governance and enterprise data platform setup.
* Experience with BI tools such as Microsoft Power BI, SAP BusinessObjects, or Oracle BI is a plus.
* Familiarity with Google Cloud is an advantage.
* Bachelor’s degree in IT, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Power Platform certifications preferred.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder engagement skills.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively within multidisciplinary teams.
* Proactive mindset with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation.


 Benefits
   

  

* A challenging, innovating environment.
* Opportunities for learning where needed.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
**Senior Software Developer**




  





 We’re looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to take ownership of the frontend for a fast-growing tech company building a highly scalable platform in a high-traffic, high-availability environment. This is a unique opportunity to lead the frontend direction, working closely with a talented UX/UI designer and collaborating with a backend-focused team.
 



  





 You’ll be part of a small, senior team where autonomy and ownership are key. Expect to work across the full development lifecycle (design, build, deploy, and run) while influencing technical decisions that will define the company’s growth.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Own and drive the frontend architecture and implementation using React, TypeScript, Next.js, and Tailwind.
* Collaborate with UX/UI designers to deliver intuitive, high-quality user experiences.
* Ensure performance, accessibility, and scalability across the frontend.
* Work closely with backend engineers to integrate APIs and optimise end-to-end workflows.
* Contribute to a culture of “you build it, you run it” with strong DevOps practices.



  





**Requirements** 



* 5+ years’ experience in frontend development, ideally in senior or lead roles.
* Expertise in React, TypeScript, Next.js, and modern CSS frameworks (Tailwind preferred).
* Strong understanding of UI/UX principles and an eye for design quality.
* Experience building responsive, high-performance web applications.
* Bonus: Familiarity with backend concepts and ability to collaborate effectively with full-stack teams.
* Ability to take ownership and thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative startup environment.



  





**Key Points** 



* VC-backed company with strong financial runway and paying customers.
* Unique product in the market with huge growth potential.
* Opportunity to shape the frontend direction and influence technical decisions.
* Autonomy and scope to grow into leadership roles as the team scales.
* Collaborative, innovative culture where your ideas shape the product and the future of the company.



  





 If you are interested, please apply with an updated CV.
 



  





 All applications must be in Stockholm with a valid working visa.

title: SEB Tech Trainee Programme 2026-27: Solution Developer | SEB, Stockholm
description:
**Do you want to challenge, change, and steer our company into the future? Are you passionate about technology and ready to make a difference? Then you will thrive at SEB.**
 At SEB, we believe in fresh thinking, new working methods, and innovation to create a fairer and more sustainable world. Since SEB was founded in 1856, our focus on customers and long-term relationships has been at the heart of our success, while we place a strong emphasis on sustainability and digitalization as we shape the future of SEB.
   

  

 With the Tech Trainee Programme and as an employee, we'll help you develop new skills and take on more responsibility to create a positive impact.
 **You will become a crucial key player in shaping the future of the bank.**
 Your Tech Trainee position and your team
   

  

**Join SEB’s journey to become a data-driven bank!** 
 We believe every team member has the potential to grow and make a real impact - no matter where you start.
   

  

**As a developer in SEB’s IT Asset Management team, you will** 
 be part of a dynamic and collaborative team that values continuous learning and shared responsibility.
   

  

 Our open culture encourages knowledge sharing through pair programming, problem-solving workshops, and regular ‘Demo Fridays’. The development team consists of a mix of junior and senior developers.
   

  

**In Your Role, You Will**
* Help us deliver innovative and data-driven solutions
* Be part of an Agile delivery team, contributing throughout the entire lifecycle—from design to production support
* Develop line-of-business applications with a strong focus on IT Asset management, playing a key role in delivering solutions in close collaboration with stakeholders and cross-functional teams
* Be able to work across the full stack, as the delivery area continues to grow – from database modelling and back-end development to APIs, user interfaces, and integrations with other critical systems within the bank
* Be supported by experienced colleagues and encouraged to experiment, ask questions, and develop new skills every day


**Our Tech Stack**
* .NET, C#
* Angular, TypeScript, HTML/CSS
* REST APIs
* GitHub, CI/CD
* SQL Server
* Visual Studio Professional and VS Code
* Kubernetes
* GitHub Copilot


 Simultaneously by working in the role you are being recruited to,
 **you will participate in SEB's Tech Trainee Programme for six months** 
 . It will give you the opportunity to develop an extensive network within the bank, gain a deep understanding of the financial industry and our global tech organization, and be professionally and personally challenged.
   

  

 As part of the programme, you can expect to: contribute to meaningful projects, work on tech tracks, gain communication and leadership skills, and participate in a hackathon and a business challenge.
   

  

 Key traits to thrive in this role and programme
   

  

 We’re looking for young talents who are curious, motivated, and ready to question the status quo.
   

  

**To thrive in this role and in the Tech Trainee Programme, we believe you have:**
* Graduated within the past two years, or will graduate before the programme starts on 1st September 2026 – from a relevant academic degree or a two-year vocational education in IT or tech
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, and the ability to take ownership
* Great communication skills and to be able to work in English
* Some experience or interest in technologies like .NET, Angular, and REST APIs, or are motivated to learn them with our support


**We Also Believe You**
* Bring curiosity and a collaborative spirit to our team, ready to tackle challenges together
* Value teamwork, open communication, and shared responsibility


 Previous experience (part-time work, student projects, labs in IT/Tech etc.) and involvement during your studies are advantageous but
 **what matters most is your potential and passion** 
 .
   

  

 In our recruitment, SEB behaviours are something we consider when choosing whom to hire. These behaviours include creating value, acting long-term, and building positive relationships.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

* A six-month trainee programme, designed for professional and personal development
* A full-time employment in the role you have been hired for, after completing the programme successfully
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Networking and collaboration opportunities
* A real business challenge to solve with other participants in the Tech Trainee and International Trainee programmes, where you can create value and make a difference for SEB
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Mentorship from senior leaders


**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 The application period for the Tech Trainee programme is open until 11th January 2026 23:59 CET.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position, please contact career@seb.se, but we will not process applications via e-mail.
   

  

 The Tech Trainee Programme will start on 1st September 2026.
   

  

**Our recruitment process**
 We want to get to know you, and for you to get to know us.
   

  

**The Recruitment Process Includes**
* Psychometric tests
* Interviews – digitally and/or on-site
* A case exercise and presentation
* SEB Day – an event to learn more about SEB and the programme, with insights from former trainees


 Please note that the Alva Labs assessments will be connected to the email you applied with.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and history of crime. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, which is why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Find out more about the Tech Trainee Programme here: Tech Programme | SEB
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Full Stack .NET with AWS | Stockholm
description:
Are you a
 **Full Stack .NET Developer** 
 passionate about cutting-edge automotive technology? Do you thrive in a dynamic, innovative environment where your skills can make a real impact? If so, the team in Stockholm is looking for you!
 



  





 The ALTEN Sweden, Stockholm office is home to a dynamic, highly skilled team of engineers and developers from all over the world who specialize in delivering tailored solutions across sectors like automotive, telecommunications, life sciences, and IT. Known for their collaborative spirit, the team combines deep technical expertise with a proactive, problem-solving approach, fostering an environment where creativity and efficiency meet to drive impactful results for clients. With a strong focus on professional development and a supportive culture, the Stockholm team is dedicated to both individual growth and collective success, making it an exciting and empowering place to be a part of.
 



  





**WHAT WE OFFER YOU** 



* A supportive and inclusive workplace with a focus on personal and professional growth.
* Opportunities to expand your skill set with access to ALTEN’s global network of experts.
* Individual education budget.
* Work-life balance days: three extra days off per year.
* Collective agreement, Pension, insurances, and wellness grants.



  





**WHAT YOU WILL DO** 



* Develop and implement full stack solutions using .NET framework and modern front-end technologies
* You’ll work on exciting, high-impact projects
* Collaborate closely with automotive engineers and product teams to deliver solutions that meet the highest standards in performance, scalability, and safety.
* Innovate and optimize software systems for advanced automotive applications, such as infotainment systems, autonomous driving, connected vehicles, and more.
* Take part in the full development lifecycle, from concept and design through testing, deployment, and continuous improvement.
* Contribute to a culture of excellence by sharing your expertise and staying ahead of the latest industry trends.



  





**WHO YOU ARE** 




 We are looking for a mid-senior level developer with a minimum of 4 years of work experience. You’re a driven developer with a passion for automotive technology and hands-on experience in full stack development.
 


* A degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent.
* .NET framework (.NET/.NET Core) and C#.
* Front-end frameworks - React, Angular, Vue.js.
* Experience in the automotive sector.
* Strong knowledge of software architecture principles and best practices for high-quality code.
* AWS and CI/CD.



  





**ABOUT ALTEN** 




 ALTEN is one of Europe's largest engineering and IT consulting companies, with over 57,000 employees in approximately 30 countries. Our engineers carry out complex and highly technical projects throughout the product development chain for leading companies in a variety of industries, such as Automotive, Defense & Security, Energy, Industrial Equipment, Public Service, and Life Sciences. In Sweden, we have around 1,300 dedicated employees with nine offices in nine cities – from Lund in the south to Skellefteå in the north.
 



  





 For the fifth year in a row, ALTEN has been named one of Sweden's most attractive employers by Karriärföretagen, an award for employers who offer unique career and development opportunities.
 



  





  





 Welcome to read more about us at alten.se

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description:
**We’re looking for an accomplished developer with experience in all aspects of building web applications to help us create the best video commerce platform on the market.** 




  





 The Bambuser Research & Development department builds the world’s best video-based shopping solutions, using our pioneering in-house live video platform continuously developed over the last 17 years. We have a long legacy of quality engineering in this space.
 



 As a Bambuser team member, you will have the opportunity to contribute at the forefront of the emerging market that is video commerce. You will have a chance to work both individually and in close collaboration with others on projects in the challenging environment of real-time live video applications. You will join a group of highly skilled engineers including top open source contributors and world-class experts in their respective fields.
 



 Our philosophy is to build robustly, scalably, and securely for the future, emphasizing quality and practicality, without over-engineering. We ship early and often, and learn from our experiences.
 



  





**What you will do** 




 In the role of Full Stack Web Developer, you will develop, deploy, and maintain the frontend and backend of one or more of our web applications in use by millions of people worldwide.
 



 Opportunities to show off your skills will vary across projects, and may include for example: designing the high-performance caching strategies for high-volume APIs, building React applications from scratch, or optimizing GitLab CI/CD deployment pipelines.
 



  





**Who you are** 



* You have at least 5 years working as a Full Stack Developer, Software Engineer, or similar role.
* You have at least 3 years experience building, deploying, and maintaining both the frontend and backend of modern web applications.
* You have at least 2 years experience working extensively in JavaScript/TypeScript code bases.
* You have strong problem-solving skills and the ability to debug complex issues effectively.
* You have a solid understanding of the uses and limitations of the standard building blocks of web services, e.g. REST, databases (relational and document), caches, message queues, serverless/server-based, transfer protocols, etc.
* You have a strongly rooted security mindset and the proclivity to build securely by default.
* You have experience collaborating with other developers in shared code bases, acting as a reviewer for others as well as having the ability to structure and explain your own code changes concisely.
* You have a proven ability to plan, execute, and complete development projects, both independently and in collaboration with others.
* You know when it's the right time to accept technical debt and when it's time to pay it off.



  





**Nice to haves** 



* Experience building B2B SaaS platforms
* Experience building enterprise services
* Experience working in start-up or scale-up businesses



  





**Toolkit** 



* Google Cloud Platform (Firebase, Firestore, AppEngine, Cloud Functions, PubSub, Memorystore, etc.)
* Amazon Web Services (EC2, CloudFront, S3, Lambda, RDS, Route53, Elastic Beanstalk, SQS, ElastiCache, etc.)
* MariaDB/MySQL, PostgreSQL, BigQuery
* JavaScript/TypeScript (Node.js, React, Webpack)
* HTTP Live Streaming (HLS), WebRTC, WebSocket
* Bash/Dash, Docker, Git, GitLab
* WooCommerce and Shopify for demo sites
* Gemini CLI, OpenAI APIs, Lovable, Cursor



*While we welcome applications from everywhere, please note that at this stage we are prioritizing candidates who are already based in Stockholm and eligible to work in Sweden without visa sponsorship.* 




  





**Curious to see Bambuser in action?** 




 Check out bambuser.com to explore how our platform powers shoppable video for brands worldwide. You’ll find product demos (Live, Shoppable Video, Video Consultation and Chat) and stories from some of the world’s most iconic retailers. If you’re excited about shaping the future of video commerce, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and join us on the journey! 🚀
 



  





*This job ad was written by a human (alleged).*

title: Fullstackutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 6 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling.
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av självständig backendutveckling i Java 8 eller senare, varav minst 4 års erfarenhet av Spring Boot.
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av automatiserade CI/CD-pipelines och containerisering, exempelvis med verktyg som GitLab, Bitbucket Pipelines och Docker.
* Minst 2 års hands-on erfarenhet av att bygga och driftsätta applikationer på AWS.
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att utveckla frontend-applikation/-er med React.
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av agila utvecklingsmetoder så som scrum, kanban samt verktyg så som Jira.
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av Linux
* Minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet av relationsdatabaser (t.ex. Postgres)
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av eventbaserade system (t.ex. MQTT, RabbitMQ)


**Meriterande**
* Minst 2 års hands-on erfarenhet med att jobba med DevOps och Terraform.
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av Kubernetes
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av TypeScript
* Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet av beredskapsarbete och relaterade verktyg så som Grafana
* Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet av rollen som Tech Lead eller Lead Developer.
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av .Net


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 08-12-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Engineering Manager
description:
**Help us redefine what it means to be a financial partner for everyday heroes**
 Sambla Group has already helped over 1 million customers take control of their finances. Today we are entering a new chapter. Our ambition is to move beyond loan brokerage and become a trusted personal finance partner. That means supporting customers across more aspects of their financial lives, building app-first experiences, exploring new ventures, and focusing on lasting relationships rather than one-off transactions.
   

  

 We are looking for an
 **Engineering Manager** 
 who wants to be part of this journey. This role is about enabling teams to build products that matter, fostering technical excellence, and helping engineers grow. You will work closely with Product to align priorities, ensure healthy delivery, and maintain the long-term technical health of systems and teams.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Lead and support a cross-functional engineering team, ensuring clarity, alignment, and focus
* Partner with the Product Manager to prioritize work, plan increments, and balance delivery speed with long-term system health
* Ensure high standards in software design, architecture, developer experience, testing, security, and operational reliability
* Establish and track meaningful engineering and product metrics that drive continuous improvement
* Coach and mentor engineers, support career growth, and foster a culture of learning, ownership, and collaboration
* Promote modern engineering practices including CI/CD, observability, and secure coding
* Collaborate with stakeholders across Security, Architecture, Compliance, Data, and Design to deliver safe and high-quality products in a regulated environment
* Help evolve how we work: ways of working, technical patterns, and team processes


**What We Are Looking For**
* We’re looking for someone with a solid background in software engineering who has also taken on leadership responsibilities, such as serving as an Engineering Manager or Tech Lead
* Solid understanding of modern engineering practices and system architecture
* Experience working in product-oriented teams with iterative development and frequent releases in a highly regulated sector
* Ability to build strong partnerships with Product Managers and cross-functional stakeholders, and raise the bar for ways for working within the team and department
* Comfortable using data and metrics to run experiments, guide decisions and measure outcomes
* Passion for coaching, developing people, and fostering a supportive team environment and a dynamic Engineering Culture in the department
* Experience in our technologies: TypeScript, Node.js, React, Next.js, AWS (including CDK and CloudFormation)
* You lead with clarity, calmness, empathy, and accountability
* Experience or understanding of IT governance frameworks, the agile manifesto, and regulatory standards such as DORA or GDPR is considered a bonus


**Why this role?**
* Lead with impact: guide a team that ships products used by thousands of customers
* Shape how we work: help define engineering practices and quality standards at an important stage in Sambla’s evolution
* Grow and develop people: play a key role in coaching and supporting engineers as they progress in their careers
* Work in partnership: collaborate closely with Product to create clear priorities and predictable, meaningful delivery
* Work with purpose: what you enable helps everyday people improve their financial lives


**What we offer:**
* Business in mind & people at heart – we deliver results together and celebrate our achievements.
* A varied and challenging role in a multinational and highly innovative company, where we value the development of our employees
* We are strong believers in creating a fun workplace where people enjoy coming to work.
* A friendly culture with openness and respect for one another, with the possibility to influence and make a difference on society and people’s everyday lives.


 Please note!
   

  

 As part of our efforts to foster an unbiased recruitment process, we kindly encourage you to not include picture, gender, ethnicity, religion, disability, sexual orientation or age in your CV.

title: Senior Software Developer
description:
Here at Billogram, we like to be the good guys of billing, making money when clients are happy and pay on time, rather than from missed payments. We believe it always pays off to treat people well. That's why our platform for invoices and payments is built to remove pain points and instead be beneficial to both our clients and their customers, improving their relationships. We’re looking for a talented Senior Software Developer to join our Stockholm team in a hybrid role and help us shape the future of billing!
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We’re looking for a Senior Developer who’s excited by the challenge of rethinking how billing gets done. If you love collaborating with a diverse team, finding new angles to solve problems, and making an impact on real customer experiences, you’ll fit right in. You’ll join a friendly crew of developers, product managers, and other stakeholders who share a passion for building a great platform to prove that great business grows from great relationships. This is a flexible hybrid role based in Stockholm, with no relocation assistance offered.
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 



* **Standardize & Scale** 
 : Help shape a platform that’s ready to grow into new European markets. You’ll refactor, optimize, and test our systems so they can handle more transactions and delight more users.
* **Tackle Tech Debt** 
 : Fine-tune existing solutions so they run smoothly for larger clients, higher traffic, and increased complexity.
* **Create Real Value** 
 : Dive into coding, requirement analysis, and testing to build features that our clients and their customers will love.
* **Lead & Collaborate** 
 : Work side by side with other developers, share fresh ideas, guide technical decisions, and keep our platform moving forward.



  





**What We’re Looking For** 




 We want someone humble, hungry, and happy: eager to grow, curious about how things can improve, and excited about shaping the future of billing. You enjoy discussing big ideas but are also comfortable rolling up your sleeves to make them happen.
 



  





**Key Qualifications** 



* **Language Expertise** 
 : At least 4 years of professional experience in PHP or Python (ideally both, but strong in one with openness to learn the other works too), ideally working on products with real-world impact.
* **Adaptability** 
 : An openness to learning new tools in our stack (think AWS, databases, and more).
* **Product Mindset** 
 : Comfortable in a collaborative, product-focused environment, where everyone’s ideas matter.
* **Problem-Solver** 
 : A knack for breaking down complex challenges into clean, maintainable solutions.



  





**Bonus Skills** 



* **B2B & B2C Background** 
 : Experience building solutions for business and consumer needs.
* **Scaling Know-How** 
 : Exposure to international expansion or platforms that operate across borders.
* **Payments Experience** 
 : A couple of years (or more) dealing with payment systems, transactions, or other financial services.



  





**Why Work with Us?** 




 At Billogram we promise you an exciting journey as we break into new markets and grow at a rapid pace. That aside you will get lots of freedom and opportunity to develop together with great colleagues at our office, right in the center of Stockholm. We also offer flexible working hours, exciting challenges and a whole lot of laughs.
 



  





 We're committed to your long-term development, offering clear career progression paths. You'll also enjoy a fantastic benefits package, including 30 (+2) days of holiday, an occupational pension, a flexible wellness allowance, sick leave top-up, and parental leave compensation. At Billogram, our inclusive and diverse culture ensures that everyone can enjoy a fulfilling career and a great work-life balance.
 



  





 This recruitment process is managed internally, and we respectfully request no contact from recruitment agencies.
 



  





 At Billogram, we provide equal opportunities and strive for an inclusive and diverse environment. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to gender, transgender identity or expression, ethnicity, religion or other beliefs, disability, sexual orientation, or age.
 



 Welcome to the world of Billogram!

title: Test Automation Developer
description:
**Large Company With Great Ambitions And Close Relations**
 Efficy is a leading European Customer Relationship Management (CRM) solution that provides businesses of all sizes with comprehensive, flexible, customizable, and scalable software to support their growth. Efficy’s platform includes solutions for marketing automation, sales, project management, customer service, and customer engagement. Currently, more than 300,000 users across 63 countries rely on Efficy’s tools.
   

  

 Founded in 2005 and headquartered in Brussels, Efficy has around 500 employees working in local offices across Belgium, France, Spain, the Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Norway, Poland (Warsaw), Hong Kong, or remotely.
   

  

 Our mission is to contribute to the success of every company by helping them turn customer data into valuable insights while simplifying their employees' work.
   

  

 At Efficy, no two days are the same, and things evolve quickly. So, fasten your seatbelt and join us on this exciting journey!
   

  

**A Unique Work Experience & Company Culture**
 We want our employees to thrive in their daily lives, which is why you can expect exciting challenges, online music quizzes, onsite ping-pong tournaments, and much more. Communication is informal, and your colleagues are always just a short call away.
   

  

**Your Impact**
 As a Test Automation Developer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining test automation frameworks and infrastructure. You will collaborate closely with engineering teams to embed quality into every stage of the development lifecycle. Your experience in building scalable automation solutions and integrating them into CI/CD pipelines will be key to driving continuous improvement in our testing practices.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Framework Development: Build and maintain robust, scalable test automation frameworks tailored to business and technical needs.
* CI/CD Integration: Set up and manage automated testing within CI/CD pipelines to ensure smooth and reliable deployments.
* Quality Advocacy: Promote a proactive testing mindset across teams, encouraging early-stage testing and continuous feedback.
* Team Enablement: Support and guide developers in adopting test automation practices, tools, and standards.
* Collaboration: Work closely with development, product, and DevOps teams to ensure quality is a shared responsibility.
* Continuous Improvement: Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies in test automation, and recommend improvements to tools and processes.


**About YOU**
* Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven experience in building, developing and maintaining test automation frameworks from scratch.
* Solid understanding of CI/CD concepts and hands-on experience with pipeline configuration.
* Proficiency in various testing types (unit, integration, functional, performance) and automation tools.
* Strong coding skills with a focus on clean, maintainable, and scalable cod


**We offer YOU**
* A stable and growing company with an entrepreneurial mindset, where your ideas are valued, and we support you in making them happen
* High flexibility—hybrid work is part of our DNA
* State-of-the-art offices where teamwork is the norm
* International growth opportunities and internal mobility
* A competitive salary package with a referral program
* Engaging events: team lunches, after-work gatherings, sports activities, and trips
* Learning opportunities: languages, technology, product knowledge, sales techniques, and leadership development


 Do you have questions about this position? Please contact jobs@efficy.com
   

  

 Find more jobs at https://jobs.efficy.com
   

  

*Efficy is a people-first employer, committed to providing equal opportunities for all candidates. We take pride in the diversity of our team and welcome you—exactly as you are. This includes your gender identity, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, age, or disability status.*
*If you're interested in joining us, we encourage you to apply. We can’t wait to meet you!*
**Disclaimer**
 Efficy does not accept unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please refrain from making phone calls or sending emails.
   

  

 All résumés submitted by search firms to any Efficy employee via email, the internet, or any other method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be considered the sole property of Efficy. No fees will be paid if a candidate is hired as a result of an unsolicited referral or through other means.

title: Dev Lead
description:
**Om Milepost** 





 Vi på Milepost är en snabbt växande laddoperatör med över 600 egna ladduttag runt om i Sverige. Vårt system hanterar hela kedjan – från administration och drift av laddplatser till kundens upplevelse vid själva laddningen. Vi står nu inför en spännande tillväxtresa och söker en Dev Lead som vill ta helhetsansvaret för backenddelen av vår plattform – från arkitektur och kod till deployment och drift.
 




  





**Om rollen** 





 Som Dev Lead får du ett övergripande ansvar för backendutvecklingen och den tekniska infrastrukturen som driver vår plattform. Du blir både hands-on utvecklare och teknisk ledare, med ansvar för att säkerställa driftsäkerhet, skalbarhet och hög kodkvalitet. Du arbetar tätt tillsammans med produktägare, frontend- och appteamet för att bygga en plattform som möter framtidens krav på smart och tillgänglig elbilsladdning.
 




  





**Ditt ansvar** 



* Driva backendutvecklingen – från design till produktionssättning
* Skriva och granska kod i TypeScript (Node.js)
* Säkerställa driftsäkerhet, prestanda och skalbarhet i våra backendtjänster
* Designa och underhålla API:er för interna och externa integrationer
* Hantera deployment och drift i Google Cloud Platform via Kubernetes
* Arbeta med CI/CD-pipelines, Terraform och Git
* Samarbeta med produktägare och team för att planera och prioritera utvecklingen



  





**Vår teknikstack** 



* Node.js & TypeScript (koa, slonik, zod, turborepo)
* PostgreSQL
* Redis, Pub/Sub, BullMQ
* Docker & Kubernetes (GCP)
* Git, GitHub Actions & Terraform



  





**Vi letar efter dig som** 



* Har djup erfarenhet av backendutveckling i JavaScript/TypeScript
* Har mycket goda kunskaper i PostgreSQL
* Har erfarenhet av Redis, Pub/Sub och BullMQ eller liknande kö- /meddelandesystem
* Är van vid att arbeta med Docker och Kubernetes i molnmiljö, gärna GCP
* Har arbetat med CI/CD, Git och Terraform
* Har förmåga att ta tekniskt helhetsansvar – från arkitektur till drift



  





**Extra plus om du har** 



* Tidigare erfarenhet som Tech Lead eller Dev Lead
* Jobbat med system med höga krav på tillgänglighet och transaktionsflöden (t.ex. betalningar eller IoT)
* Intresse för skalbarhet, säkerhet och monitorering
* Erfarenhet av mikrotjänst- eller eventdriven arkitektur



  





**Vårt system består av** 



* Ett Backoffice-UI för administration av laddplatser, tariffer och betalningar
* Backend som hanterar all affärslogik och integration med partners
* Android- och iOS-appar som kunderna använder för att starta, övervaka och avsluta sina laddningar



  





**Varför Milepost?** 




 Hos oss får du:
 


* Jobba med hela livscykeln – från kod till moln
* Stort inflytande på produkt, teknikval och arkitektur
* Frihet och ansvar i en snabbrörlig miljö
* En chans att vara med och bygga framtidens laddplattform i Sverige



  





**Låter det som något för dig? Skicka en ansökan till info@milepost.se**

title: SAP Senior ABAP Developer - Shape the Future of Corporate Payments | SEB Kort, Solna
description:
SEB Kort is looking for an experienced, technically strong, and driven SAP Senior ABAP Developer with a focus on interfaces (m/f/d) ‘SAP Adapter’. You are passionate about building robust, secure, and scalable systems and thrive on solving complex technical challenges as well as sharing your knowledge with others. Joining our dynamic international team, you will play a key role in our mission to be the market leader for corporate payments in Europe.
   

  

**About The Role**
 You will join the SAP platform team and contribute to a state-of-the-art S/4HANA landscape. In addition to coordinating with other expert teams in the SAP environment (billing/charging/invoicing), you will be responsible for the development and further development of various SAP interfaces (primarily Microsoft Dynamics 365).
   

  

**Who You Are**
 We believe you are an experienced developer who combines strong technical skills with excellent communication ability. You are a problem-solver, team player, and systems thinker who takes initiative and contributes to the bigger picture, always with the customer in mind.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* In the context of a modern S/4HANA landscape, you will be responsible for planning, designing, customising, developing and testing ABAP programmes
* Customer-specific ABAP developments throughout the entire software lifecycle and, in particular, the connection of our CRM system Microsoft Dynamics 365 to the SAP landscape
* ABAP software engineering activities with a focus on interfaces (API, SOAP, REST, iFrame, microservices)
* Analysing and resolving technical and application-related problems and incidents
* Supporting regulatory audits in the context of ABAP developments and the software development process
* Supporting and adapting the software development process, enhancements and deployment concepts in relation to ABAP developments
* Ensuring high standards in code quality, testing, documentation, and system performance
* Taking an active role in sharing your knowledge and contributing to improving customer experience


**Who We Are Looking For**
* A completed degree in Computer Science or a comparable qualification
* You have extensive experience in ABAP development
* You have experience with various interface technologies
* Knowledge of developing interfaces to external applications (‘SAP Adapter’) and OData services is an advantage
* You have knowledge of SAP business processes (E2E)
* Conceptual and analytical skills as well as quick comprehension and a goal-oriented way of working
* Practical experience with DevOps and agile methodologies is a must
* Fluency in English


**What We Offer**
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Excellent office environment
* Work-life balance


**Ready to take the next step on your career journey?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than
 **21st of December, 2025** 
 . If you have questions about the position, please contact Elinor Franzén, Talent Acquisition Partner, at elinor.franzen@seb.se.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB here: www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Backend Developer (Go)
description:
At Ubiquiti Inc., we create technology platforms for Businesses, Smart Homes, and Internet Service Providers, driven by our goal to connect everyone, everywhere. To date, Ubiquiti has shipped over 100 million devices worldwide, from ISP networking products to next generation of IT solutions. Our growth is made possible by the dedicated team of hundreds behind the scenes. From software developers and product managers to designers and strategists, Team UI is driven to achieve our common goal: Rethinking IT. At Ubiquiti, you’ll heighten your potential and broaden your horizons - all while shaping the future of connectivity.
   

  

**Join forces with us on our mission to build a better IT industry. We are currently looking for a highly skilled Backend Developer (Go) to our team in Stockholm, Sweden.**
***Please note that applicants must live in Sweden and hold a valid work permit at the time of application to be considered for this role.***
**Responsibilities**
* Develop efficient, scalable, and maintainable backend services
* Develop integrations with network device firmware and other applications
* Integrate feature designs with larger software systems
* Co-work with cloud architects, backend developers, frontend developers, designers, and other stakeholders


**Requirements**
* 5+ years of experience with Golang is required
* Experience with RDBMS and NoSQL
* Experience with developing REST and MQTT API
* Experience with Git/GitHub
* Experience with Linux and Docker environments
* Good understanding of SOLID principles
* Ability to work independently
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Strong sense of ownership of tasks and responsibilities
* Highly proficient in English (written and spoken)


**Nice To Have**
* Familiarity with Java development
* Experience with Spring or other web framework knowledge
* Knowledge of Bash and Unix
* Knowledge of WebRTC and WebSockets
* Good understanding of networking protocols and architectures
* Experience developing AWS cloud services / DevOps
* Experience with SD-WAN and/or VPN technologies
* Familiarity with the Agile software development processes


**Benefits**
* International work environment
* Competitive compensation package including wellness allowance, occupational pension, medical insurance, private health insurance, life insurance and work-injury insurance
* Five weeks of holiday per year
* Flexible work hours and hybrid work model
* Modern office space located in Epicenter (Hötorget)
* Access to all the latest Ubiquiti products and prototypes for home use and tests


***Please note that a background check will be conducted in the final stage of the recruitment process***

title: Backend Engineer - Java/Golang/AI
description:
We are looking for a passionate (Backend Engineer | AI Engineer | AI Agent Developer) to join the IT studio, the team responsible for advancing the digital workplace experience. Our mission is to give every user the best possible user experience from the moment they open their device. By doing so we seek to remove the friction of work, unblocking users to be more productive—anywhere, anytime—with simplicity and safety—with an experience that makes the client one of the best places to work.
   

  

 As an engineer supporting the "AI Momentum" strategy within the Identity and Access Management squad, you will be instrumental in integrating the latest AI tools with our IAM landscape, to enhance security and authorization controls. This involves building an MCP Gateway integration with our SSO platforms, along other projects related with employee identity access management. You will also contribute to the adoption of AI Agents as first-class citizens for our IAM environment. You will assist in upskilling IT teams in AI fluency, fostering a culture of competency and shared language through knowledge sharing sessions.
   

  

 What you’ll do
   

  

* Proactively collaborate closely with engineers, product designers, and product owners to build solutions that drive the evolution of client's Identity Management landscape towards an AI-first company keeping security as our guiding light.
* Proactively identify potential risks introduced by third party tools that are AI-enabled and integrated into client's collaborative tooling suite and build solutions to minimize this impact.
* Take operational responsibility for the components that you develop.


 Who you are
   

  

* Experienced in designing, building, testing, debugging and optimizing code of agentic systems/workflows, MCP servers and latest AI-tools.
* Experienced in designing, building, testing, debugging and optimizing code of identity authentication and authorization integrations, using standard protocols included, but not limited to, SAML, OIDC, Oauth 2.0.
* Coding languages you have experience on ideally are Java and Go.
* Love working on a team where you constantly learn, experiment, and iterate quickly.


 Where you'll be
   

  

* This role is based in UK or Sweden.
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! We are a remote-first squad distributed between the US and Europe.

title: Software Developer (React Native)
description:
***Vill du vara med och utveckla framtidens streamingupplevelse?***




*Hos TV4 möts teknik, innovation, nyhetsjournalistik, sport och underhållning. Just nu på en spännande resa för att bygga nästa generations streamingupplevelse, med målet att leverera Sveriges bästa mediaplattform för miljontals användare, varje dag. Nu söker vi flera erfarna React Native- och Webbutvecklare till playtjänsterna.* 




  





**Om rollen** 




 I rollen fokuserar du på användarfunktionerna hos nyckelplattformarna webb och app. Teamet ser till att användarna får en sömlös användarresa samt skapar en spännande interaktionupplevelse för TV4:s kunder över alla deras plattformar. Vi letar därför efter Fullstackutvecklare med spets i React Native för att stärka upp teamet.
 



  





**Du kommer bland annat att:** 



* Arbeta mot en smidig och rolig användarupplevelse på TV4:s olika kanaler
* Designa skalbara mikrotjänster med fokus på prestanda, säkerhet och driftbarhet
* Driva och äga projekt och spännande features tillsammans med kollegor med olika kompetenser
* Komma med nya idéer och förbättringar
* Jobba end-to-end, från idé till implementation



  





**Om dig** 




 Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av app- och webbutveckling med React Native och vill vara med och driva vårt team framåt. Du har ett starkt engagemang, är nyfiken på att lära dig nytt och ser AI som ett naturligt verktyg för att höja både din egen och teamets leverans. Hos oss får du en inkluderande miljö där mångfald är en styrka och där din nyfikenhet och ditt engagemang får växa i en ständigt föränderlig vardag.
 



  





**Vi ser gärna att du:** 



* Har ett par års erfarenhet av app- och webbutveckling i React Native
* Har erfarenhet av Node.js, React, Typescript och AWS (eller annan cloudtjänst)
* Har en fallenhet för systemtänk, du kan översätta den stora bilden till dess beståndsdelar och tillbaka
* Har vana av att arbeta med hela processen från start till mål
* Har en kandidat- eller masterutbildning inom Systemvetenskap eller annat relevant område



  





**Det är ett plus om du har:** 



* Erfarenhet av Golang



  





**Mer om erbjudandet** 




 Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm (TV4-huset) med gångavstånd till Gärdets tunnelbana. Kontoret erbjuder eget gym, parkeringsgarage, restaurang samt takterrass. Rollen erbjuder även:
 



  




* Kollektivavtal, med tjänstepension, friskvårdsbidrag m.m
* Vara en del av TV4s ekosystem och ta del av de tjänster som TV4 erbjuder sina kunder
* Rabatter via Benify
* Kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling där du även har chans att växa inom vår organisation
* Jobba i en sann AI-first kultur där du får påverka vår AI-resa framåt
